metadata.titel_preek: A Singer Sings Of Life And Death

kernfrasen: end yard toward which we are moving
tramp of time goes on like some relentless army
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A JOURNEY TOWARD DEATH
LIFE IS A CYCLE OF SEASONS

kernfrasen: bedrock upon which my hope is founded
Rock of Ages as his footing and his foundation

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Thou hast made my days as an handbreadth

mapping_structuur.doel_element: Total span of a human life

cognitieve_implicaties: The end is always within reach
onbedoelde_consequenties: Potential nihilism if the 'hand' is seen as insignificant

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the biblical image by explicitly defining it as 'the width of four fingers,' forcing a physical visualization.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: I'm wearing this world as a loose garment

cognitieve_implicaties: The world is external to the true self
Life can be 'taken off' easily at death
theologische_implicaties: Dualism between soul and material world

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: A common trope in African American and Southern homiletics, used here to bridge generational wisdom.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully links the passage of time (Seasons) with the movement of the individual (Journey) and the need for stability (Foundation).

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The sermon shifts rapidly from God as an unmoving 'Rock of Ages' to a Shepherd leading through 'green pastures.'
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: A rock provides immobility and safety; a shepherd provides movement and nourishment.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: God is personified as walking through the seasons ('appointed rounds'), unifying time and space.

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes the 'dead' metaphor of a handbreadth and makes it tactile.
Uses the melancholy of Autumn to tap into universal feelings of aging.
sterktes.voorbeeld: wistful, so melancholy, touched and tinged with an unutterable sadness

risicos.beschrijving: The 'graveyard preacher' section risks making death the only reality, potentially overshadowing the 'Life' promised in the title.
risicos.voorbeeld: the graveyard is not the end yard toward which we are moving right now

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A landscape of changing seasons where a lone traveler moves toward a wintery graveyard.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; creates a stark contrast between human mortality and material durability.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Contrasted against the 'palsied hands' and 'fading beauty' of humans.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Perfectly fits the 'Watch Night' or New Year's Day transition schema.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'TIME IS A PHYSICAL PATH' and 'LIFE IS A SEASONAL CYCLE' metaphors. It leans heavily on the melancholy of the Source Domains to drive the hearer toward the Target Domain of 'Hope in God.' The landscape is one of movement and decay, where only God provides a 'Static' domain (Rock/Foundation).

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Conventional/Dead at the end of the sermon.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'Shepherd' to the 'Winter' imagery—how does a shepherd lead in the snow?
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: He is the shepherd who finds us in the damp mist of our winter.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The shift from the 'Vain Shadow' to the 'Rock'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the metaphor of 'Light' to bridge them—the Rock is what casts the shadow or is revealed when the shadow flees.

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Work and Sweat' of Summer to show the garment is for service, not just disposal.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: The title mentions a 'Singer,' but the sermon focuses on 'Walking.'
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The harmony of a life lived in God despite the 'minor keys' of suffering.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using embodied seasonal imagery to ground abstract existential anxiety.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'melancholy tone,' CMT reveals that this tone is built on the cognitive mapping of biological decay to spiritual urgency.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's learning styles, CMT shows how the preacher uses the 'Path' schema to move the hearer from 'Observation' to 'Trust'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher's power comes from 'Schema Disruption'—attacking the 'Life is a Picnic' schema to force a re-evaluation of the 'Foundation' schema.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Winter is the grip of death
appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'Verticality' schema (God's throne, lifting the burden) to provide a solution to the 'Horizontal' problem of the journey toward the grave.
